title: Fast Antibiotic Resistance-Based Gene Editing of Mammalian Cells with CRISPR-Cas9 (FAB-CRISPR).pdf
abstract: We present a detailed pipeline using HDR donor plasmids containing antibiotic resistance cassettes for rapid selection of gene-edited cells. Our protocol streamlines N- or C- terminal tagging in human cells, enabling HDR donor plasmid preparation in a single cloning step.
